data.eml:eml: Two new species of Halacarus (Acari, Prostigmata) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pepato, Almir R., Silveira, Paulo Sergio Amorim Da (2013): Two new species of Halacarus (Acari, Prostigmata) from Brazil. Zootaxa 3670 (4): 591-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3670.4.10
